Generated.description: Store all files created or modified during the documentation process.

<timestamp>.description: Timestamped directory for organizing files by process instance.

Content.description: Store files created during the documentation process.

files.new.md: List of new tools or tools with changed operations (new, updated, or removed).

Source-of-Truth.description: Store original files downloaded from sources. These files should not be edited.

files.tools.json: Original tools file from the content team.
files.azmcp-commands.md: Original tools file from the engineering team.

Logs.description: Store logs or intermediary files created during the process.

files.azmcp.log: Log file for issues and intermediary steps.
files.current.log: Tracks the current timestamp directory being worked on.

Prompt.description: Store JSON version of prompt file.

Reports.description: Store reports generated during the documentation process.

files.setup.1.prompt.report.json: Summary of changes made during the prompt.json generation process.

files.current.log: Track the current timestamp directory being worked on.
